text: aqgniM ~MvA Eqtasyaq SarI#raM gacCatiq sOmaq(gm)q rasOq varu#Na EnaM ~MvaruNapAqSEna# gRuhNAtiq sara#svatIqM ~MvAgaqgnAviShNU# AqtmA yasyaq jyOgAqmaya#tiq yO jyOgA#mayAvIq syAdyO vA# kAqmayE#taq sarvaqmAyu#riyAqmitiq tasmA# EqtAmiShTiqM nirva#pEdAgnEqya -maqShTAka#pAla(gm) sauqmyaM caqruM ~MvA#ruqNaM daSa#kapAla(gm) sArasvaqtaM caqrumA$gnAvaiShNaqva-mEkA#daSakapAla-maqgnErEqvAsyaq SarI#raM niShkrIqNAtiq sOmAqdrasa#M - [  ]  41
